items.name: Classic Shrimp Boil
items.description: A generous portion of plump shrimp, corn, and potatoes, tossed in our signature Cajun butter sauce.

items.name: Crab Feast
items.description: Succulent crab legs served with corn, potatoes, and sausage, seasoned to perfection.

items.name: Calamari
items.description: Crispy fried squid rings served with a side of marinara sauce.

items.name: Garlic Butter Mussels
items.description: Steamed mussels cooked in garlic butter and served with toasted bread.

items.name: Grilled Salmon
items.description: Freshly grilled salmon fillet served with a side of mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

items.name: Lobster Thermidor
items.description: A rich and creamy lobster dish topped with cheese, served with rice and garlic butter sauce.

items.name: Corn on the Cob
items.description: Sweet and buttery corn on the cob, perfect with any seafood dish.

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Crispy golden fries, perfect for dipping in our signature sauces.

items.name: Iced Tea
items.description: Refreshing iced tea brewed with a hint of lemon.

items.name: Soda
items.description: Your choice of Coke, Sprite, or Royal.

items.name: Leche Flan
items.description: Smooth and creamy caramel custard, a Filipino favorite.

items.name: Halo-Halo
items.description: A refreshing mix of shaved ice, sweetened beans, fruits, and leche flan, topped with ube ice cream.
